content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I was commanded to use the "google" command to find websites that discuss customs and traditions of different countries by region. I then used the "browse_website" command with the URL "https://www.un.org/en/observances/cultural-diversity-day" and the same question, but the answer gathered from the website was about the importance of cultural diversity and intercultural dialogue for achieving peace and sustainable development. I repeated the process with the URL "https://www.state.gov/bureaus-offices/under-secretary-for-management/foreign-service-institute/" and the answer gathered from the website was about the Foreign Service Institute. Finally, I used the "google" command one more time and used the "browse_website" command with the URL "https://www.worldbank.org/en/topic/indigenouspeoples/brief/indigenous-peoples-profile" and the answer gathered from the website stated that the question cannot be answered using the text and provided information about the World Bank Group and its efforts to reduce poverty and promote sustainable development.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.worldatlas.com/articles/customs-and-traditions-from-around-the-world.html", "question": "What are some customs and traditions of different countries?"}}}'}]
"""
